name: django-like-framework
description: Django-like full-stack framework with Node.js, Fastify, and Next.js

scripts.install:all: npm run install:api && npm run install:admin && npm run install:app && npm run install:cli
scripts.install:cli: cd cli && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:api && npm run build:admin && npm run build:app && npm run build:cli
scripts.migrate: cd cli && npm run dev migrate
scripts.createsuperuser: cd cli && npm run dev createsuperuser
